User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

type the address of resource wich will respond with content-type application/json
example: 

http://api.geonames.org/citiesJSON?north=44.1&south=-9.9&east=-22.4&west=55.2&lang=de&username=demo


Actual results:

FF open standard window for unrecognized file type and proposes either "save as" or "choose a program".

However if i address regular text/javascript resource
http://www.mozilla.com/js/download.js
, it is opened by firefox. I can do the view source. But ay the same time i can not do the view source of json.


Expected results:

json should shown in browser similar to javascript OR similar to xml structure
